channel.title: Suzanne Collins on Strat
channel.description: Recent content in Suzanne Collins on Strat

item.title: Gregor The Overlander
item.description: It’s heartbreaking. I’m tearing up by page 4. This series is advertised as a story for kids but it’s written in such a way that it’s just as interesting reading through it as an adult. A younger reader wouldn’t catch all the subtext (and there’s a lot of it).
